actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to require that each reprint of certain material from the Congressional Record shall bear a notation that it is a reprint from the Congressional Record.

summary.text: Requires that each reprint of material from the Congressional Record shall bear a notation that it is a reprint from the Congressional Record. Imposes a penalty of up to 6 months imprisonment and/or a fine of up to $500 for failure to make such notation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to require that each reprint of certain material from the Congressional Record shall bear a notation that it is a reprint from the Congressional Record.
